column2: sherry bilsing graham ellen plummerstory brian buckner sebastian jonesdirected by gary halvorsontranscribed by eleonora pheeboh roni vanessa
monica hey can i borrow the porsche
a place to entertain my lady friends
and what else is it not
what do you need it for anyway
oh well the powerball lottery is upto 300 million and they don't sell tickets here in new york so
so you're driving up to connecticut
hey maybe i'll drive you up there
i'd like to buy some tickets myself
yeah with chandler not getting paid we could really use 300 million dollars
yeah because if i was at my old job we'd say 300 million
hey will you get me tickets too
why don't we all pitch in 50 bucks we'll pool our money together and then if we win we'll split it
you don't wanna win the lottery
sure i do and i also wanna be king of my own country and find out what happened to amelia earhart
seriously ross you don't want in on this
do you know what your odds are of winning the lottery
i mean you have a better chance of being struck by lightning 42 times
yes but there's six of us so we'd only have to get struck by lightning 7 times
seriously you guys i can't believe you're going to spend 250 dollars on the lottery i mean that's such a bunch of boohaki
oh oh we think emma is about to start talking so we're trying to be careful about what words we use in front of her
yeah so get ready to hear alot of ehm
how do you know she's gonna start talking
well when i talk to her i almost feel like she understands what i'm saying
you know i haven't won anything since the sixth grade
you assume because i was heavy that's the only way i could win something
no i saw a picture of you covered in blueberries
they're towing your car they're towing your car
i'm parked in a garage on morton
and rachel you don't have emma
my mother picked her up two hours ago
yes and you talked to her
so did you come by to watch us win the big bucks
and then i figured after you win we could all go out to the balcony and see a night rainbow with gremlins dancing on top of it
i'll get it i'll get it i'll get it
hey charlie what do you know
chandler is supposed to find out if he's getting an assistent job at his ad agency
but out of the 15 interns they are only hiring three
yeah if only it were a sure thing like your 24 state lottery
alright call me when you know more
one of the slots got filled
no that kid nate got it
well there's two spots left right
i mean i want this so much
i mean i wanna get one i want my friend charlie to get one
except i don't care about charlie
ok you're not going to believe this
i just saw my psychic and she said i was definitely gonna win the lottery tonight
hey that reminds me i thought we could use some extra luck so i brought a wishbone home from work
alright who wants to do it
vegetarians never get to do the wishbone
you know just because we don't eat the meat doesn't mean we don't like to play with the carcasses
oh no i'm good i don't wanna get that turkey smell all over my hands
it'll get the casserole stink off of mine
you're both wishing for the same thing right
i can't tell you what i'm wishing for
but we know what you're wishing for
i understand but you're wishing for what we think you're wishing for aren't you
i'm not really comfortable with these questions
you know what i'm sure your wish is gonna come true but you guys just in case maybe a genie will come out if we rub this lamp
you know ross just keep making your jokes
how are you gonna feel if we actually do win
oh i know i know the odds are against us but somebody has to win and it could be us
and then how you gonna feel
you know we're gonna be all like oh everybody let's take our helicopters up to the cape and you're gonna be all like oh i can't guys i'll meet you guys up there i gotta gas up the hyundai
ok i've heard myself on tape and i sound nothing like that
i can see the headline now lottery winners' friend filled with regret eats own arm
why would i eat my own arm
well you wouldn't but we own the paper we can print whatever we want
i'm gonna throw in 50 bucks for you
because i know that you think the lottery is boohaki but we're all here and gonna watch the numbers and have fun
and you're my brother and i want you to be a part of this
you don't have to do that i'll pay for myself
but just the fact that you want me to have fun with you guys that's so sweet
ok so now that you're in what are you gonna do if we win
i don't know probably just invest it
oh i'm sorry did i say invest it
i meant be cool and piss it all away
we should pool all own money and buy the knicks
i don't really care about the knicks
oh you will when i pick you as starting forward
you know i'm not sure a sports team is the way to go
you're not gonna let me buy the knicks
i can't believe you're taking this away from me
you're right it has been you dream for over 15 seconds
uh how long until they announce the numbers mommy
i'll take this one too uh
oh i've gotten into the habit of calling rachel mommy when we're around emma
which i now realize we are not
i'm hoping that if she hears it enough it will be her first word
although if we're gonna do that we should probably call me daddy too
i was just talking about rachel
have you been a baaad gi
oh man i would have slept with him
but hey there's one spot left right
well no charlie's gonna get that
you got just as good a chance as anybody else of getting that job
ooh you guys it starts in like 20 minutes
we need to sort out the tickets as quickly as possible to see if we've won
so does anybody have any ideas how to organize this
ok how about this we divide them into 6 groups of 40 and the remaining 10 can be read by whoever finishes their pile first
i'm sorry idea time is over
ok well are all the tickets in the bowl
what about the ones you have on the nightstand
there are no tickets on the nightstand
yes there are i just saw them a few minutes ago
honey there are like 20 tickets on the nightstand
well well well look what mommy found
i bought 20 extra tickets for me and chandler
the psychic also said that i would be betrayed
i can't believe this i thought we were all in this together
hey you just got in 5 minutes ago
i don't know why that's important
i was with you the whole time we were in connecticut when did you even get those
when you were reading the dirty magazines without taking off the plastic
ok well monica suppose one of your special tickets win
how are you gonna feel when you win the lottery and you lose all your friends
if i win the lottery you guys are not gonna leave me
someone gave me a basket of mini muffins last week and i couldn't get rid of you for 3 days
chandler would you just tell her what she did was wrong
she's right you shouldn't have bought tickets just for us
however it doesn't look like i'm gonna get this job so i can't afford to have principles so screw you the tickets are ours
if you win the lottery it's the last you're gonna hear from us
yeah and then i'll pay for their plastic surgery so they'd look just like you
i want my share of the tickets
yeah i want my tickets too
and if i win i'm gonna put it all into a very low yield bond
we've got to keep all the tickets together
we should divide them up and i should get extra because we used my card to buy them
hey if anybody gets extra tickets it should be me
this all thing was my idea
fine i can't take it anymore
i'm putting an end to this
oh if she jumps i get her tickets
if we are not doing it together we're not doing it at all
so say goodbye to your tickets
can i come a little bit closer valuable things are getting squished
no what's more important your friends or money
hey monica what about your extra tickets
even these five that i hid in my bra
there was no way i was gonna dump this
i think i broke your bowl
what a beautiful night to be running around the street looking for tickets
and the wind sure made it fun
phoebe we lost half of them
monica we have the winning ticket
my psychic said i was gonna win remember
your psychic didn't mention anything about the scary pigeon
as a matter of fact she said that's how i am going to die
so excuse me for being a little skittish
th this is the pigeon from the balcony calling to apologise i sh
i shouldn't have knocked the tickets out of the pretty lady's hand
it it was all my fault
well i bet that was very hard for him to do
it turns i got the last spot
i'm really sorry man it was a lot of fun working with you
give me a call if you want
oh god i am so sorry honey
it's like that time they promoted sandra over me at work
oh is she related to ralph lauren
no she was just much better at job than me
guys the drawing is about to start
we should call my mum's house and say goodnight to emma before she goes down
oh yeah it's a good idea
honey you've been really strong about this i know how badly you wanted that job
yeah you know i really thought i deserved it
i mean we still have 130 chances to win right
and remember you're daddy's little girl
phoebe's totally ruined that for me
hi mum put her back on
my god i can already feel myself changing
here we are the official powerball numbers
we are on a roll people
i know you love your new lips but i can barely understand you
would you please just let me say goodnight to my daughter
guys you're not gonna believe this
i was just saying goodnight to emma and she said her first words
why why aren't you more excited
oh but of course it is
i don't know all the words
i'm just i'm just glad i didn't miss my daughter's first words
yes you did gleba is a word
ok use it in a sentence
okay okay okay fine i'm gonna look it up
you know what while you're at it she said another word the other day why don't you why don't you look up pbbqqt
here it is the fleshy spore bearing inner mass of a certain fungi
ah the i'm sorry i rejected you phone call
i'm not used to getting it from guys
i'm sure you've heard we filled the three positions
we just felt that with your maturity and experience you wouldn't be happy being someone's assistant
oh no no no no i'd love to be somebody's assistant
answering phones getting coffee i live for that stuff
chandler you were the strongest person in the program
we're offering you the position of junior copywriter
me that guy who just said butt cracks
we're excited about the level of sophistication you'll be bringing to the job
ok well thanks you won't regret it
oh yeah i'm gonna be a junior copywriter
oh sweetie i'm so proud of you
does that mean i get the good loving tonight
hey that is so great about the job
and i like to think i had a little something to do with it
i didn't wish we would win the lottery i wished you'd get the job
listen don't tell monica she'll rip your heart right out
there is a little part of me that really thought we were gonna win
so much for my dinosaur amelia earhart theme park
you guys what was the powerball number again
phoebe you don't have any of the first five numbers
i know that but look we've got the powerball number we've won 3 dollars
wow you'd think we should get that over 20 years or go for the big payout
i don't care i've never won anything before i can't believe this
so pheebs what are you going to do with your 3
i guess if everybody else is
hey guys so i just called the powerball hotline can you believe it
maybe nobody won the jackpot but there was this guy in here earlier and he found the ticket on the street right outside and won 10 000
it was me the pigeon coo
